about_the_game:
“Guns are Funs”: an exciting arcade shooter. The little red men have crossed all boundaries, and now you have to show them who is boss.
Control your cannon and destroy enemy fortifications. Collect resources, upgrade your ammunition and develop skills to become invincible. Use unique abilities and bonuses to achieve victory. Be accurate, otherwise you will have to admit defeat.
The difficulty of the levels increases as you progress, so be prepared for a challenge.
To make the game easier, you can collect resources in runner mode. Once you have collected enough resources, you can spend them on purchasing additional shells and unlocking new abilities. In addition, each completed level of the runner will allow you to learn more about the plot of the game and advance in its disclosure.
In addition to the story campaign, the game has a “Sandbox” mode, where you can play both modes without story restrictions and compete for records.
Our game will be an excellent choice for lovers of puzzles and adventure. Complete all levels, reveal all secrets and become the real hero of this exciting story!

Game Features:

• Vibrant 3d graphics
• Exciting and funny plot
• Different game modes
• Author's musical accompaniment

name: Guns are Funs Demo
short_description: Guns are Funs is a fun and exciting arcade game for people of all ages. It will help develop coordination of movements, accuracy and logical thinking. You have to shoot from a toy cannon at towers made of cubes.
